nodes.text: Bann was a Human male member of the Imperial Reclamation Service of the Sith Empire. He was a member of Darth Silthar and Barden Golah's team that uncovered the The Imprisoned One's mind prison on Tatooine. Alongside Keighlah and Perrin, he got infected by the Rakata device and had to be put down. Captain Golah later lamented his death.
